search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for SimpleTexting (simpletexting.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for SimpleTexting is [https://simpletexting.com/pricing/](https://simpletexting.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

The only software company with Fred
-----------------------------------

And lots of other great humans that are here to help 7 days per week—by phone, text, chat, or email.

[Chat Now](https://simpletexting.com/pricing/#sales)

![Image 47: Fred, a customer service team member from SimpleTexting, is waving and smiling.](blob:http://localhost/a4d9febbad60653b6edfb840aeb4e18a)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Haven't found what you're looking for? Get in touch or visit our [Help Center](https://help.simpletexting.com/en/).

### What are carrier fees?

Some wireless carriers, such as Verizon, AT&T, T-Mobile, and others, charge additional costs to send and receive messages. On average, these carrier fees amount to approximately $0.0025 per message in the United States and $0.0068 in Canada. We never mark these up. View the [full fee schedule](https://help.simpletexting.com/en/articles/4714940-carrier-fees-for-toll-free-numbers).

### Do you offer a discount for nonprofits?

Nonprofits, churches, and other tax-exempt organizations receive 15% off any of our monthly plans.

### Do I get charged if people text my number?

All incoming SMS messages are free! Incoming messages with photos or other media attached (MMS) cost 1 credit each.

### What is the character limit for texts?

SMS is limited to 160 characters and costs 1 credit each. With our extended messaging feature, you can send messages up to 306 characters. Each extended message costs 2 credits. MMS allows up to 1,600 characters, costs 3 credits each.

### How do rollover credits work?

On monthly plans, remaining plan credits roll over until the end of the following month. Before dipping into your rollover credits, we’ll pull from the credits on your plan first. If you downgrade your plan, your rollover credits will be lost. Read more about [rollover credits](https://help.simpletexting.com/en/articles/1944286-do-message-credits-roll-over).

Big decision, we know.  
Why not try it first?
----------------------------------------------

Send yourself a text to see how things work before you decide to use SimpleTexting for your business. If you need any help getting started, we're here for you.

[Try It Free](https://app2.simpletexting.com/sign-up)No credit card required

#### Let's find out what you need

Answer a few questions and we'll suggest the right plan for you

Which of these describe your business?

 Consistent You always have something going on.

 Seasonal Your business ebbs and flows. Some months you'll send a lot of messages. Others very few.

Get your credits upfront As a seasonal business, you benefit from paying annually to get a bucket of credits upfront. You can spend more credits during busy months, and fewer during slow months. Plus, you save 20%!

About how many contacts do you plan to message?

About how many times per month will you message them?

Will you send picture messages (MMS)?

 All the time MMS messages cost 3 credits each. We'll suggest a more generous plan.

 Sometimes A good choice if you're unsure. We'll assume 1 in 3 messages will be an MMS.

 Never You're keeping it plain and simple. Nothing wrong with that!

Close Next

#### This plan is the best fit for you

Based on your needs, this plan will give you the lowest cost per message

$39.00

#### Which number type is right for you?

You can text-enable your existing landline or get a new one of the following:

Local Most popular

$10/mo + $4 activation fee | Same-day activationLocal numbers are ideal for nearly all use cases. You can select an area code your customers will recognize, the approval process is quick, and you can reliably message several thousand people per day.

Toll-free number

No additional fee | Activation time variesPrefer an 800 number? No problem! We can text-enable yours or provide you with a new one. It can take up to a week to gain approval from carriers to start texting on your toll-free number, due to industry regulations.

Dedicated short code

Begins at $1,000/mo | Activation time variesThese short 5 to 6-digit numbers are great for advertising campaigns and mass texting. Dedicated short codes take 6-8 weeks to provision. Learn more about [dedicated short codes](https://simpletexting.com/solution/dedicated-short-code/).

Most people would agree cookies make life better. For us, they help us make our site and marketing better. But if you don’t like cookies, that’s cool – you can let us know by clicking the settings button!

Allow all Cookie Settings

#### Your Cookie Choices

When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser, mostly in the form of cookies. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Because we respect your right to privacy, you can choose not to allow some types of cookies. Click on the different category headings to find out more and change our default settings. However, blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience of the site and the services we are able to offer.  
[Cookie Statement](https://simpletexting.com/cookie-statement/)

 Strictly Necessary Cookies (always active)These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work.  
These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information.

 Performance CookiesThese cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous.  
If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

 Targeting CookiesThese cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device.  
If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising.

Allow all Confirm my choices

Our SMS marketing pricing is flexible and affordable. Learn about our text marketing plans that can fit every business. Try it for free today!
